channel.title: LIVE TO TAPE with Johnny Pemberton
channel.description: Johnny Pemberton talks to himself and others. Its funny, weird, and sounds cool.
channel.itunes:author: Johnny Pemberton
channel.itunes:summary: Johnny Pemberton talks to himself and others. Its funny, weird, and sounds cool.

image.title: LIVE TO TAPE with Johnny Pemberton

item.title: Lucas Neff
item.description: Actor, comedian, and whispering siren of madness and truth, Lucas Neff, joins the live to tape experience. Its a classic full studio experience with multiple exciting tangents including an interactive robocall.
item.itunes:title: Lucas Neff

item.title: Chris Locke
item.description: Comedian and coolest dude in whatever town he's in, Chris Locke, visits and talks and sings. Its both deep and splash-fresh shallow.

item.title: CAST-OFF-SHOOTS
item.description: a new lick-shot SOLO episode all about cast off drifting spider webs and rad sounds from underneath the grounds.

item.title: Duncan Trussell
item.description: Finally! A return visit from once and true king of the quirting birds: Duncan Trussell. Johnny and Duncan explore musical options and tell ancient blue jay tales that can never be untold or unheard. Also Duncan has a mental breakdown live on the podcast.
item.itunes:title: Duncan Trussell
item.itunes:summary: Finally! A return visit from once and true king of the quirting birds: Duncan Trussell. Johnny and Duncan explore musical options and tell ancient blue jay tales that can never be untold or unheard. Also Duncan has a mental breakdown live on the podcast.

item.title: Chris Crofton

item.title: Josh Fadem, Dicker, and Trumpy Bear
item.description: Mastermind comedian/movement specialist, Josh Fadem, joins the executive buffet for some new ideas on the child acting question. Kevin gets hardcore sassed by a call center operator at trumpy bear and Dicker replaces Johnny for a piece of time.

item.title: Jeff Spurrier and Grocery Outlet

item.title: BERRY BALLS
item.description: Another classic Kevin Tipcorn dial session. We talk to a mega grumpus at the herb factory, leave some cool bread nugget voicemails, and connect with an angel to teach about the Armenian Genocide.

item.description: Coolest chillest most hilarious dude alive, Steve Agee, fogs up the glass with his special brand of fog on an all new episode of live to tape. Johnny and Steve answer some tough questions like "what is it about food" and more. its a blaster!!

item.title: Tim Meadows
item.description:
Legendary Detroiter comedian Tim Meadows soaks up the studio for some absurd chatter and magnetic tape scrubbing. ALSO!! the first edition of 'bad questions' which turned out pretty good.


Don’t miss an episode! Subscribe @ smarturl.it/livetotape

Like what you hear? Check out Twisting the Wind @ smarturl.it/twisting


Oh! Check out our survey @ smarturl.it/feralsurvey

item.title: Mark McKinney
item.description: Time-traveling amphibious raconteur, Mark McKinney, delivers an explosive tongue lashing for consecutive double-digit minutes with our semi-fearless host. this episode features the first installment of "bad questions", sure to be a successful recurring segment.
item.itunes:title: Mark McKinney

item.title: Bert Kreischer
item.description: The man that many now know as "The Machine", Bert Kreischer, fogs up the studio with Johnny as stories are told, remembered, and forgotten. It's a fully ripping blaster, as usual.

item.title: Brad Breeck & Kyle Mabson
item.description: A fresh blast from the festive trumpet featuring musical friends Brad Breeck (The Mae Shi) and Kyle Mabson (XBXRX). Expect to get entangled in multiple webs of rad sounds and sidebar commentary. This is the first chapter in the new musical edition of the podcast.

item.title: Conner McVicker
item.description:
Yet another windy blast straight from the dusty madness of South Africa. The guest is brilliant and bizarre young actor, Conner McVicker, who shares some amazing tales of woe and triumph.

item.title: Matty Goldberg
item.description:
Author, comedian, and long time very cool guy, Matty Goldberg, slides into the audio taping studio district to tell tales of unbelievable past times and comment on the future.
Buy his new book: https://www.amazon.com/No-IQ-Ten-hilarious-essays/dp/1540445305/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1481233058&sr=1-1
item.itunes:title: Matty Goldberg
item.itunes:summary:
Author, comedian, and long time very cool guy, Matty Goldberg, slides into the audio taping studio district to tell tales of unbelievable past times and comment on the future.
Buy his new book: https://www.amazon.com/No-IQ-Ten-hilarious-essays/dp/1540445305/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1481233058&sr=1-1
item.content:encoded:
Author, comedian, and long time very cool guy, Matty Goldberg, slides into the audio taping studio district to tell tales of unbelievable past times and comment on the future.
Buy his new book: https://www.amazon.com/No-IQ-Ten-hilarious-essays/dp/1540445305/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1481233058&sr=1-1

item.title: Whitmer Thomas
item.description: The hilarious super skateboarding comedian, Whitmer Thomas, jumps guitar first into the live sound pool for a furious expansion of vocal exclamations and mini musical treats.
item.itunes:title: Whitmer Thomas
item.itunes:summary: The hilarious super skateboarding comedian, Whitmer Thomas, jumps guitar first into the live sound pool for a furious expansion of vocal exclamations and mini musical treats.
item.content:encoded: The hilarious super skateboarding comedian, Whitmer Thomas, jumps guitar first into the live sound pool for a furious expansion of vocal exclamations and mini musical treats.

item.title: David Dineen-Porter
item.description: Maniacal musical genius, David Dineen-Porter, visits the live studio podcast taping arena to dole out a thick serving of Sumerian history combined with ancient guitar tones and vocal outbursts. An instant classic soon to be repeated.
item.itunes:title: David Dineen-Porter
item.itunes:summary: Maniacal musical genius, David Dineen-Porter, visits the live studio podcast taping arena to dole out a thick serving of Sumerian history combined with ancient guitar tones and vocal outbursts. An instant classic soon to be repeated.
item.content:encoded: Maniacal musical genius, David Dineen-Porter, visits the live studio podcast taping arena to dole out a thick serving of Sumerian history combined with ancient guitar tones and vocal outbursts. An instant classic soon to be repeated.

item.title: Beth Stelling
item.description: Internationally known comedian and emotional genius, Beth Stelling, goes live to tape for some reminiscing and nostalgia smashing and singing to some keyboard demos.
item.itunes:title: Beth Stelling
item.itunes:summary: Internationally known comedian and emotional genius, Beth Stelling, goes live to tape for some reminiscing and nostalgia smashing and singing to some keyboard demos.
item.content:encoded: Internationally known comedian and emotional genius, Beth Stelling, goes live to tape for some reminiscing and nostalgia smashing and singing to some keyboard demos.

item.title: Jeff Pemberton
item.description: Blood relative and underground midwest creative, Jeff Pemberton, joins his brother for the first time in the studio! It’s actually the first episode of LIVE TO TAPE that was ever recorded. Cool Stories, confessions, and audio rabbit holes abound in this most beautiful episode.
item.itunes:title: Jeff Pemberton
item.itunes:summary: Blood relative and underground midwest creative, Jeff Pemberton, joins his brother for the first time in the studio! It’s actually the first episode of LIVE TO TAPE that was ever recorded. Cool Stories, confessions, and audio rabbit holes abound in this most beautiful episode.
item.content:encoded: Blood relative and underground midwest creative, Jeff Pemberton, joins his brother for the first time in the studio! It’s actually the first episode of LIVE TO TAPE that was ever recorded. Cool Stories, confessions, and audio rabbit holes abound in this most beautiful episode.

item.title: LITTLE HANG ON BABY
item.description: Brief transmissional audio place holder for you and yours. Regular programming will return very soon, please enjoy this in the meantime for fun and information.

item.title: Duncan Trussell
item.description: God’s personal medicine boy, Duncan Trussell, gets recorded live to tape in this extra-special, fully-blasted, not-to-be-missed, psychedelic audio listening experience. Everything you need to know about the the future of time is contained in this wonderful easy listenin’ episode.
item.itunes:title: Duncan Trussell
item.itunes:summary: God’s personal medicine boy, Duncan Trussell, gets recorded live to tape in this extra-special, fully-blasted, not-to-be-missed, psychedelic audio listening experience. Everything you need to know about the the future of time is contained in this wonderful easy listenin’ episode.

item.title: Joel Department
item.description: multidisciplinary creative mastermind Joel Fox (aka the “Joel Department”) goes live to tape with special musical accompaniment from his musical friend Lem Jay Ignacio. http://joeldepartment.com/

item.title: YACHT
item.description: the second official and unofficial episode of Live to Tape featuring the band YACHT, which is comprised of Jona Bechtolt, Claire Evans, and Rob "Bobby Birdman" Kieswetter.
item.itunes:title: YACHT
item.itunes:summary: the second official and unofficial episode of Live to Tape featuring the band YACHT, which is comprised of Jona Bechtolt, Claire Evans, and Rob "Bobby Birdman" Kieswetter.

item.title: JK Simmons
item.description: Academy award winning actor, JK Simmons, appears on the premiere episode of LIVE to TAPE to chat about the good ole days of smoking in the pines and how modern technology needs to relax.
